bioconda.name: bioconductor-rgreat
bioconda.summary: GREAT Analysis - Functional Enrichment on Genomic Regions

biotools.summary: This package makes GREAT (Genomic Regions Enrichment of Annotations Tool) analysis automatic by constructing a HTTP POST request according to user's input and automatically retrieving results from GREAT web server.

bioschemas.name: rGREAT
bioschemas.summary: This package makes GREAT (Genomic Regions Enrichment of Annotations Tool) analysis automatic by constructing a HTTP POST request according to user's input and automatically retrieving results from GREAT web server.
